Here is the **Euler-Lagrange's equation**

$$
\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}t}(\frac{\partial{\mathcal{L}}}{\partial{\dot{p}}})=\frac{\partial{\mathcal{L}}}{\partial{p}}
$$
